lom:description.lom:string:
Women@SCS presented the first of what is hoped to be an Annual series of forums on girls and technology in education and entertainment. The event successfully brought together more than 160 teachers, academics, students, and members of the business community for a full afternoon of talks and brainstorming. Together, the group that was present discussed topics ranging from girl-friendly classroom strategies, to software game development and beyond.
The goal of the event was fourfold:
1. To provide a comprehensive overview of girls' relationship with technology in education, entertainment and the home. 2. To explore new technologies that more accurately reflect girls' interests and needs. 3. To discuss how these technologies can be made more available to girls, including those in disadvantaged situations. 4. To create opportunities in which girls can influence the development of new technology, both for themselves and for society at large.

lom:title.lom:string: Leading the way : girls, technology and education
